DESCRIPTION: When an enemy is asleep, it will not act until it receives damage. When it receives damage, it will go back to the intent it had before sleeping.
For each 5 stacks, enemy deals 1 less damage. Decreases by a third of all stacks at the end of the round.
Any card with "Claw" in its name counts as a claw.
Deal damage to the target equal to the amount of Burn stacks on the target. Remove all Burn stacks.
At the end of the round, enemy loses #b50% of their Block.
This card will not affect the Charge-Meter.

At the start of their turn, for each Leech Seed the enemy has, it loses #b1 #yHP, and you gain #b1 #yHP.  At the end of the turn, if the leech seed's owner has not taken any damage from any other source, the amount is reduced by half.
The first #b2 #ySkill played each turn will grant you #b1 #yFocus each. NL When you #yexit this #yStance, #yevoke your next #b2 #yOrbs.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the number of Plated Armor Stacks. Reduce this amount by one evertime you take damage from an enemies attack.

#yPledge #yCards are #yFire #yPledge, #yGrass #yPledge and #yWater #yPledge. NL Fire+Grass: 9 Poison to ALL enemies. Fire+Water: 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Grass+Water: 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Grass+Grass: Gain 1 Thorns. Fire+Fire: Gain 1 energy. Water+Water: Gain 3 Temporary Strength.
Every time you get attacked, attacker receives Poison.
When you play an #yAttack, #ychannel #b1 #yLightning if you have any empty #yOrb slot. NL When you #yexit this #ystance, gain #b7 #yBlock.

When you receives damage, increase the number of #yRecovery stacks by as much damage you received. NL When you deal attack damage, heal 30% of the attack damage dealt up to the number of #yRecovery stacks you had last turn.
You cannot play cards that target the enemy.
At the start of your turn but after you draw, if this card is in your discard pile add it to the top of your draw pile.
Additional defense that will take damage instead of your #yHP. It acts like #yHP. You keep #yTemporary #yHP between turns but not between rooms.
Poison on enemies affected by Toxic go up by the amount of stack instead of going down.
Your next attack deals #b1 more damage per Vigor stack (before applying powers like #yVulnerable and such).
